descriptionHtml:
This is a player home mod complete with many useful utilities that any player might need upon returning to their safe house! This mod was created to make trips back to your safe house easy, quick and convenient, allowing more time for quests and exploration in the wonderful world of Skyrim! This home is one cell, one room, and one load screen! 

Included: - All crafting stations - Every Standing Stone - Every Shrine of the Divines - Every Trainer (capable of training to level 100) - A personal merchant (with 20,000 gold, a large assortment of useful items, and the ability to purchase your stolen goods!) - Several safe, non-respawning storage containers.

 ***Known bugs/issues*** - Dialogue lines for some original trainers have been altered, resulting in unspoken lines. These original trainers are still capable of training skills, however. - Training costs for skills above level 90 are relatively cheap (around 900 gold). I intend to set these costs higher as soon as I figure out how. :/ 

Location: South/Southwest of Dushnikh Yal in the Reach. Feel free to reference screenshots provided.

I hope you all enjoy! This is my first mod so please feel free to leave comments, suggestions, bugs, etc. and I will do my best to address them.
author: Jack0fallspades
